title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.35 - Elmira Correctional and Reception Center
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.35 - Elmira Correctional and Reception Center

State Regulations

There shall be in the department a facility to be known as
the Elmira Correctional and Reception Center, which shall be located at Elmira
in Chemung County, New York, and which shall consist of the land and buildings
formerly occupied by Elmira Correctional Facility and Elmira Reception Center. The Elmira Correctional and Reception Center shall be classified as a maximum
security facility, to be used for the following functions: (a) general confinement facility for males 18
years of age or older; (b) reception facility for males 18 years of age or older; and
(c) diagnostic and treatment
center. Notes

100.35

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
